subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Triathlon
lead_paragraph: AS Andy Potts, one of the top triathletes in the world, trains for the Olympic trials Saturday in Tuscaloosa, his wife, Lisa, battles cancer. It is a team effort.
snippet: AS Andy Potts, one of the top triathletes in the world, trains for the Olympic trials Saturday in Tuscaloosa, his wife, Lisa, battles cancer. It is a team effort.
